caption.p: Height (mean and standard errors) of white spruce seedlings from each of the eight seed orchards (SO1 to SO8) for the three forest plantation sites (Asselin, Deville, and Watford) at the end of the first year of establishment (2+1) (mean and standard error, n = 256 seedlings per seed orchard). Means having the same letter are not significantly different according to a Tukey test (Î± = 0.05).
